# If new to R

# Everyone

## Download and open an Rstudio project

- Go to [https://github.com/jminnier/berd_tidyverse_project](https://github.com/jminnier/berd_tidyverse_project)
- Click "Clone or Download" (upper right), then "Download as zip"

![](img/github_download.png)

- Unzip folder
- Inside folder, click on `berd_tidyverse_project.Rproj`
- Rstudio should open this folder as a project
- Open and run R script `pre_class_homework.R`
